availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John. M. Chevis (Nicholas County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Married to Mary J. Chevis. Father of Alice Chevis and Henry D. Chevis. Merchant in Nicholas County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned eight enslaved individuals in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, p. 276.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 1.
